7b21ab60-70e6-4d52-b689-f3e61cd85cd2.name: 仆从
7b21ab60-70e6-4d52-b689-f3e61cd85cd2.notes: IQ 为 0 或者有奴性

071d2650-6496-4e3f-8df8-14ec3d28c04a.name: 感同身受
071d2650-6496-4e3f-8df8-14ec3d28c04a.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0

eebf9fd3-52cd-40c3-9c06-e0e84b48a5f8.name: 感同身受
eebf9fd3-52cd-40c3-9c06-e0e84b48a5f8.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

091b7a7e-ae87-4958-81a7-a36a9936adf7.name: 感同身受
091b7a7e-ae87-4958-81a7-a36a9936adf7.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡

b87ae884-230d-4044-9c2d-709f864c4c99.name: 感同身受
b87ae884-230d-4044-9c2d-709f864c4c99.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

1675aa7d-9e46-4cec-9516-719c45379c13.name: 战斗反射
1675aa7d-9e46-4cec-9516-719c45379c13.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

3b71b97a-f76d-4831-816e-8fc4f6596538.name: 增强招架（@近战武器技能@）

96fe57e3-6d55-439b-843e-1f6e52fe3d1a.name: 幸运
96fe57e3-6d55-439b-843e-1f6e52fe3d1a.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

b0184020-25bb-46af-8fcb-683ae9c3e330.name: Luck, Extraordinary
b0184020-25bb-46af-8fcb-683ae9c3e330.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

cebd4348-9423-4757-b34f-c1dea57e5aec.name: Weapon Bond
cebd4348-9423-4757-b34f-c1dea57e5aec.notes: +1 to effective skill when using @a specific weapon@

37bc7308-da75-4af1-b1b8-700c4503ea92.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

e69c651c-4b8f-47ff-ad06-c6c4e4168115.name: 期待陪伴
e69c651c-4b8f-47ff-ad06-c6c4e4168115.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

326f6395-c3bd-45f7-9159-e00f95a4f34e.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
326f6395-c3bd-45f7-9159-e00f95a4f34e.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

f90e055a-8dc7-43cc-a918-beae49044fca.name: 执念
f90e055a-8dc7-43cc-a918-beae49044fca.notes: Become the best  swordsman in the world!

4183ec28-94b9-4eec-ba68-516d8247c069.name: Or intensify Code of Honor from Gentleman’s [-10] to Chivalry [-15] for -5 points.

5a38f26e-f986-4ae8-9a1f-ae8edc25e431.name: Vow (Never refuse a challenge to combat)

8b9c1f2c-ac7a-4760-8566-0a78414c4e8b.name: Or 1 point to raise one of those skills or any one-point primary or secondary skill by a level.
